message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a price of $18,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you is $10,000. What do you think?
Alice, your offer is quite a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product, which is the maximum I can afford.  Let me know if you're interested in negotiating at that price.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell at $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. This is my best counteroffer so far. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $14,000 is still outside my budget.  I'm firm on my offer of $10,000.  If you're willing to accept that, we have a deal. Otherwise, I'll have to look at other options.
I understand you're firm on your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $13,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you place on the product. What do you think?
